item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 12, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Mark Klein, AT&T whistleblower who revealed NSA mass spying, has died (345 points | 73 comments)
2. Show HN: Time Portal – Get dropped into history, guess where you landed (106 points | 63 comments)
3. Iconography of the PuTTY tools (125 points | 21 comments)
4. Gemini Robotics (542 points | 343 comments)
5. The DuckDB Local UI (560 points | 133 comments)
6. The Night Watch (2013) [pdf] (40 points | 11 comments)
7. Zinc, a systems programming language prototype (46 points | 14 comments)
8. I Built a Mechanical Calculator [video] (25 points | 10 comments)
9. Shenmue (1999) reverse engineering reveals possible sun position oversight (91 points | 30 comments)
10. Reverse engineering OpenAI code execution to make it run C and JavaScript (164 points | 53 comments)
11. The cultural divide between mathematics and AI (131 points | 77 comments)
12. Peer-to-peer file transfers in the browser (371 points | 197 comments)
13. Intel appoints Lip-Bu Tan as its CEO (129 points | 28 comments)
14. Parnassus plays (16 points | 1 comment)
15. Tell Mozilla: it's time to ditch Google (124 points | 167 comments)
16. Switching from Pyenv to Uv (75 points | 51 comments)
17. Practical UX for startups surviving without a designer (3 points | discuss)
18. Artie (YC S23) Is Hiring Engineer #3 ( | hide)
19. Constant-Time Code: The Pessimist Case [pdf] (61 points | 57 comments)
20. The Future Is Niri (301 points | 144 comments)
21. The insecurity of telecom stacks in the wake of Salt Typhoon (241 points | 153 comments)
22. Open-UI: Maintain an open standard for UI and promote its adherence and adoption (266 points | 85 comments)
23. Building websites with lots of little HTML pages (96 points | 37 comments)
24. Carbon recyclers: Sulfur bacteria break down organic substances in seabed (7 points | 2 comments)
25. First ammonia-fueled ship hits a snag (112 points | 187 comments)
26. Inline Evaluation Adventure (25 points | 8 comments)
27. Apple has locked me in the same cage Microsoft's built for Windows 10 users (71 points | 68 comments)
28. Gemma 3 Technical Report [pdf] (381 points | 211 comments)
29. I stopped everything and started writing C again (214 points | 224 comments)
30. Experiment with Gemini 2.0 Flash native image generation (46 points | 2 comments)
